abstract.p: Corrections to May 7 Summer Festivals music listing

block.p: A classical music entry in the Summer Festivals listings on May 7 for New York City misidentified conductors and misstated dates for the New York Philharmonic's outdoor concerts. The series runs from July 24 to Aug. 5; the conductors will be Andre Raphel Smith and Mikko Franck.
A New York State entry for the Chautauqua Opera misidentified the company's director. He is Jay Lesenger; Jean-Pierre Bonnefoux is director of the Chautauqua School of Dance and Ballet Company.

A classical music entry in the Summer Festivals listings on May 7 for New York City misidentified conductors and misstated dates for the New York Philharmonic's outdoor concerts. The series runs from July 24 to Aug. 5; the conductors will be Andre Raphel Smith and Mikko Franck.
A New York State entry for the Chautauqua Opera misidentified the company's director. He is Jay Lesenger; Jean-Pierre Bonnefoux is director of the Chautauqua School of Dance and Ballet Company.
